name: Fractured Scientists Multiple Choice Quiz | Fractured Science | 15 Questions

questions.explanation:
herpetologist.

	Herpetologists study reptiles and amphibians.

Ecologist.

	Ecologists study relationships among living things and their environments.

epidemiologist.

	Epidemiologists study the incidence, spread, and control of diseases in populations. You can bet they're working overtime these days.

Astrophysicist.

	These guys study the physical properties and movements of celestial objects.

chemist.

	Chemists study chemicals and try to make substances from them, such as medicines.

Marine biologist.

	Marine biologists study plants and animals that live in oceans.

Paleontologist.

	These people study fossils in order to learn about ancient geological periods.

astronomer.

	Astronomers study outer space and celestial objects (astrophysicists are specialists within the field of astronomy).

questions.text: Sell you lore by Ollie jest
questions.explanation:
cellular biologist.

	These scientists study cells from living tissue.

Microbiologist.

	These folks look very, very closely at living things.

psychologist.

	Some would argue that psychology isn't a science, but....these people study the workings of the human mind and people's emotions and behavior.

meteorologist.

	These folks study the weather. The weather forecaster on your local TV station may or may not be one. If I had to guess, I'd say that he or she is just a pretty face in front of some weather maps.
